author: Mark Berman
title: Police in several cities test positive for coronavirus, stirring fears of spread among first responders - Washington Post
description: Police in several cities test positive for coronavirus, stirring fears of spread among first responders Washington Post 700 N.J. police officers have tested positive for coronavirus, State Police leader says NJ.com Two Detroit cops die from coronavirus and 39…
content: The officers in Houston are part of a mounting toll across the country as police officers and other first responders are falling ill with the coronavirus. Departments are now grappling with mounting infections in their own ranks as they navigate an extraordin… [+9974 chars]
